INST1:
In this test, you must decide whether a number is odd or even. Try to do this as quickly and accurately as possible.  For example:

  114141:   odd
  141632:   even
  3:            odd
  4:            even

  When a number is ODD, make a LEFT response as shown below. . When a number is EVEN, make a RIGHT response.
 Make a response to begin.
DEBRIEF: This test is complete.  Make a response to continue.
